Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great food, great service!”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed anniversary saturday night soon arrived treated royalty staff stay special upgraded view regents park wonderfully decorated homely candles lit arrival mojito bar proceeded dinner restaurant food fantastic course found hard choose eat sounded reasonably priced top class food overall hotel restaurant bar amazing highly recommend
